MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH5 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:16am. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area and apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at Crewe Toll substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:16am on Tuesday, 13 October 2020
